casebody.data:
NC STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION
v.
STATE of NC, et al 333P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2017 Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Robert F. Orr, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Saad Gul, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, John Michael Durnovich, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina State Board of Education. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Olga E. Vysotskaya, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Hardy Lewis, Attorney at Law, Philip R. Isley, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Johnson, Mark.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of October 2017 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of October 2017."

Martin, C. J. recused
